explanation: Funds provided as part of the January 18, 2023, internal reprogramming action FY 23-14 IR (Tranche #10 Enclosure #2) are transferred back to the Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide, 23/24, appropriation. This is a congressional special interest item and an emergency budget requirement.
